findings.title: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
findings.impact: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
reproduction: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

findings.title: Images must have alternative text
findings.impact: Ensure elements have alternative text or a role of none or presentation

findings.title: Page must have exactly one h1
findings.recommended_fix: Ensure one unique h1 per page.
